name: Fantastic Fortune
overview: Fantastic Fortune is a dating simulation game. The story is set in medieval times, in the planet WARANDO. Diana is the second Princess of the Kingdon of Klein (her hobby is collecting hats), had been summoned to the Royal Academy of Magic from the human world where she was studing as a high school student (she is just 15 years old). There are three main characters to choose one at the beginning of the game and play with (Diana, Sylphis Castries & Mei Fujiwara), and during the game the player's character will spend a year at Klein to achieve the proper magic abilities. The fate of the heroine is in the hands of the player. The gameplay is about choose what the heroine is going to to each week, there are different activities for her to do that will change his stats depending of which ones she do. And there are also events like when she meet a character when the player can choose what answer will want to reply, there are some times during each week where the player can choose what place of the town wants his character to go, and there will be a different event in each place. Some of the game characters are: Seirios, Sion, Aish, Leonis, Gazel, Kiel & Jelis. The game features a museum in which the player can see or listen to the musics, graphics and voices that he unlocked playing the main game. The game got a sequel in PS2 called Fantastic Fortune 2: Triple Star.
